summary:
This mod is a retexture of argonian skin which makes it more real-looking and close to real members of reptile family.
Also mod includes optional eye retexture based on real photos of reptile eyes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/f7/7e/f77e1820714f160a7fd052c2cd22c3f2.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

===========
[youtube]Ikmo4ItQj8I[/youtube]
by Brodual

[youtube]AR-X2eCxgrI[/youtube] [youtube]00pgTouiHIc[/youtube]
by misalen and Gruntlock (Ruiuji)
===========
===========

This mod is a retexture of argonian skin which makes it more real-looking and close to real members of reptile family. Males were made closer to crocodiles. Females have snake-based skin texture.

Male textures are support most popular body types:
- Default Body
- Better Males Body
- SoS adaptation

Female texture contains the followings:
- Default skin texture
- CBBE body version
- UNP body version
- Three variants of skin pattern

NOTE: each body type file contains two variants of skin (standar glowing and no glowing versions).

Also mod includes eye retexture based on real photos of reptiles (optional).

=========================
Now you may download 1k and 2k texture packs. They contain all male and female versions except UNP (UNP version has 1k, 2k and 4k texture sizes in a separate pack)
=========================


[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/e9/4d/e94dc1e76c91e7db46e90317abfcb0b7.png[/img][/url]

Extract texture files into your DATA folder and overwrite old files if it will be necessary.
ATTENTION(!) If pattern file has no texture folder, installation will have other way:
cope one of the patterns and paste it in DATA-TEXTURES-ACTORS-CHARACTER-ARGONIANFEMALE.
Overwrite.

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/af/d1/afd1e4f9058a5b284f7e436bb91b18bc.png[/img][/url]

- Other female body types adaptation
- Raptor feet adaptation
- Fix of issues

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/d0/5a/d05a6beafdee4a2fb525cd8d9b4cb0af.png[/img][/url]

Please, do not upload this file on any sites without my permission. It's an ordinary respect. Believe me, it's very frustrating to find your work on other resources without your agreement.


[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/68/58/68581f53d6228f41baea34fbb0e22add.png[/img][/url]

Hope you'll like this little modification.
Also you a re free to upload your screenshots here.

And, please, inform me about issues and errors. The sooner they will be detected, the faster they will be corrected.


============
============
Many-many-many thanks for screenshots:

jesusoden
Imperator3
Anastasia Sakson
FlarColone
author: redtox
